projects.title: Airbnb - Annecy Apartment
projects.description: A luxury apartment rental website showcasing a high-end property in the heart of Alexandroupoli, Greece. Built with modern web technologies to deliver an elegant user experience. Features include a photo gallery, detailed room descriptions, amenities listings, and location information.
